column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: According to the General Department of Immigration
column4: an American national was arrested outside the US Embassy on the afternoon of April 30.------Immigration police said the American
column7: was wanted for crimes committed in the US. He was taken to the Department of Immigration.------*It appears he is wanted for crimes in Florida. His publicly viewable Facebook profile says he moved to Phnom Penh in December 2019.
